entry.title: $2600 // NO FEE Lefferts Garden - Roof, Gym, 24 services - Luxury
entry.content:
No Fee
Available NOW
Net Effective rents:

1 Bed 1.5 bath duplex starting at $2,600

Lefferts Garden has several new constructions offering full amenities.
Steps from Prospect Park and Q/D/2/5 trains the neighbordhood is accessible and livable. Grocery Stores, Bars and restaurants are right around the corner.

Features:
Fully finished outdoor roof area
Lounge room
Work from home office space
Fitness center
Pet Spa
Virtual Doorman
Pets Allowed
Washer/Dryer In-Unit


This building is the most luxurious BK has to offer. Please serious inquires only.
If you have kids and want to know about schools, please ask me.
Email or call for showing

I have Studios, 1 Beds, 2 Beds, 3 Bed available in several buildings across downtown BK, Fort Green, Cobble Hill, and DUMBO
Rob
